quote_content: From the love of local wisdom that tells about the way of the community village life. Create handicrafts that come from nature and diverse cultures. Each piece is hand-woven with natural dyes. Take the time to do it carefully. We produce various appliances for nature lovers.
story_content: Products from local handicrafts, It is a natural product called “Muiizin” Whether it is woven fabrics, scarves, tablecloths, cloth bags, woven bags. They were all created from the heart of “Muiizin” who wanted to support villagers in communities in every region of Thailand.
